Text:
Information Strata Collects
Strata Website
Strata does not collect personal information about visitors to our site except when visitors specifically provide such information on a voluntary basis. Personal information may be gathered from forms submitted to request additional information as well as content or blog subscriptions. We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, mailing address, telephone number, contact preferences, and other identifiers as part of our effort to transact business with you and to respond to your inquiries. We may also collect personal information from you for marketing purposes unless you specifically opt-out and request that you not be contacted in conjunction with such marketing activities.

Marketing Data Products and Services
Strata collects the following categories of information about consumers:

Name/Address
Demographic
Interest-based data
Device
Browser
Email, clear or hashed
IP address
Geolocation data
Telephone
Inferences about your predicted characteristics and preferences
Other information about you that is linked to personal information above, for example, information on individuals who have recently moved, purchased a home, obtained a hunting license, registered a boat.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Strata has collected personal information from the following categories of sources in the last twelve (12) months:

Business to business companies
Data compilers/aggregators/resellers
Public or government entities
Publishing product companies
Telecommunication companies
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Right to Know Data Collected\nAs a California resident, you have the right to request that Strata disclose the specific pieces or categories of personal information that we have collected about you in the preceding twelve (12) months.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Click here to submit a verifiable request to exercise this right.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: In order for Strata to properly verify the Consumer’s identity prior to any disclosure of information, Strata will require, at a minimum, the Consumer’s full name, address, email address, and telephone number.\n\nAlternatively, you may email dataprivacyteam@gostrata.com to initiate this request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Right to Know Data Shared\nAs a California resident, you have the right to request that Strata disclose the categories of your personal information we have disclosed or sold to third parties for a business or commercial purpose in the preceding twelve (12) months.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text:
Click here to submit a verifiable request to exercise this right.

In order for Strata to properly verify the Consumer’s identity prior to any disclosure of information, Strata will require, at a minimum, the Consumer’s full name, address, email address, and telephone number.

Alternatively, you may email dataprivacyteam@gostrata.com to initiate this request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Right to Delete\nAs a California resident, you have the right to request that Strata delete any personal information we have collected or maintain
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text:
Click here to submit a verifiable request to exercise this right.

In order for Strata to properly verify the Consumer’s identity prior to any disclosure of information, Strata will require, at a minimum, the Consumer’s full name, address, email address, and telephone number.

Alternatively, you may email dataprivacyteam@gostrata.com to initiate this request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Right to Opt-Out\nAs a California resident, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information by Strata.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text:
Click here to submit a verifiable request to exercise this right.

In order for Strata to properly verify the Consumer’s identity prior to any disclosure of information, Strata will require, at a minimum, the Consumer’s full name, address, email address, and telephone number.

Alternatively, you may email dataprivacyteam@gostrata.com to initiate this request.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Right to Non-Discrimination\nAs a California resident, you have the right not to receive discriminatory treatment by Strata for exercising your privacy rights conferred by the CCPA.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Cookie Policy\nWe use First Party Cookies to record your visit to our website.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We do permit the setting of Third-Party cookies on our website.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Privacy Policy Updates\nStrata may revise this Privacy Policy at our discretion. Any future version of the Privacy Policy generally becomes effective at the time of posting. We encourage you to periodically review the website for the latest changes. You can determine when this Policy was last revised by checking the “Last Revised” date at the bottom of this Policy. By using, and continuing to use, the site you agree to this Policy.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Google Chrome (https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647)
Internet Explorer (https://support.microsoft.com/en-ie/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies)
Firefox (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences)
